dct_title_s: Carta esferica de los reconocimientos hechos en la costa No. de America
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Covers land and waterways around Vancouver Island (B.C.).
Shows coastline, topography, drainage, islands, ports.

" ... in an Atlas marítimo español of some fifty-three maps published in Madrid between 1789 and 1814. This map was undoubtedly published shortly after 1795." - Wagner, Cartog. Northwest Coast, v. 2, p. 361.

2 profile views: Vista de la entrada de Nutka, demorando la Pta. A. al N. 27° E. del mundo distancia 21 millas ... -- Vista del Cabo Frondoso, demorando el Yslote A al N. 37° O. distancia 12 1/2 millas, B. Cabo Frondoso.
dct_creator_sm: Valdés Flores Bazán y Peón, Cayetano, 1767-1835
Spain, Dirección de Hidrografía. Atlas marítimo español.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Warren Heckrotte Map Collection courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain.  There are no restrictions on use.  If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
